text: Michael W. Frerichs (born July 28, 1973) is an American politician. He is the State Treasurer of Illinois, having taken office on January 12, 2015. He was a Democratic member of the Illinois Senate, representing the 52nd District since 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== *Illinois State Treasurer's Office *Mike Frerichs for Illinois Treasurer *Senator Michael W. Frerichs (D) 52nd District at the Illinois General Assembly **By session: 98th, 97th, 96th, 95th *State Senator Mike Frerichs constituency website * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Frerichs
